data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Emilia-Romagna, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Emilia-Romagna, Italy
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,000 people living in Emilia-Romagna through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Emilia-Romagna to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Emilia-Romagna, Italy.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Italian-speaking people.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 66 neighbors who are far from you in Emilia-Romagna. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Emilia-Romagna, Italy a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Emilia-Romagna, Italy has a population of 1,000.

We estimate Emilia-Romagna has 15 people who might know Jesus, 799 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 187 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 66 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Emilia-Romagna be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Emilia-Romagna
location.cities_list: Bologna, Modena, Parma, Reggio nell‘Emilia, Rimini
